_comment: this is the list of trains services with their average speed, source for India:https://indiarailinfo.com/trains, for thalys: time through wikipedia and distance using google maps, for nsb :- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High-speed_rail_in_Norway, for rest of europe:- data from acprail, for australlia:- wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AvonLink,https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transwa_Prospector,https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transwa_Australind) for national rail :- https://www.onaverage.co.uk/speed-averages/58-average-train-speed, for amtrack:- https://www.amtrak.com/national-facts & https://www.quora.com/How-fast-do-Amtrak-trains-go, for viarail(canada):-https://cptdb.ca/topic/5860-via-rail-train-speed/
